question: Who among the following leaders led the Revolt of 1857 in Sambhalpur?
explanation: For restoring the self-respect of people, Surender Sai led the Revolt of 1857 in Sambhalpur. He sacrificed his life fighting against the British and died in Asirgarh Jail in 1884.The main cause for this revolt was the interference of the British in the internal affairs of Sambhalpur.
